## TransactableLiquity.sendLUSD() method

Send LUSD tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendLUSD(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./arth-lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LUSD to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./arth-lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.
